ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: Your fears are well founded, young dwarf. The Lesser Faydark was corrupted by the touch of Cazic-Thule. The darkness fell across that woodland right
ygData.messageBody:
Your fears are well founded, young
dwarf.<br><br>The Lesser Faydark was corrupted by the touch of
Cazic-Thule. The darkness fell across that woodland right
after his banishment of the Mother of All and the
corruption of Equestrielle.<br><br>Be warned: far more
dangers besides the sprites and brownies now reside in
LFay.<br><br>A rogue of your seasons could be of great
assistance in defending Kelethin. Speak with others in the
area. Crushbone, it is said, will invade. And they'll
need every able-bodied fighter they can
find.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Knight Commander<br>General of
Kelethin<br>Lanys T`Vyl
